messages.subject: Sorry, here's "Candle lighting Thursday"
messages.msgSnippet: Light a Candle for Unity! Though terrorists may have struck out at us as Americans, let us come together and show our unity. Let us show that though our arm
messages.messageBody:
Light a Candle for Unity! Though terrorists may have struck out at us as
Americans, let us come together and show our unity. Let us show that though
our arm may have been hurt, they can not dim the heart of America which rages
bright. On Thursday September 13, 2001 at 10:30 pm EST, walk out your door
and light a candle or lantern to show the world that our spirit burns bright.
Place candle in your window. Gather with loved ones or gather with neighbors
but let our light burn in the night to show that we are united and that we
remain strong. Please pass this on to anyone you know..print it up and pass
it to neighbors who may not have internet access, post it to message boards,
clubs, news stations, anywhere and everywhere that there is a PROUD American!




Kimberly U



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
